meanings.sent1: The children laughed at the blague the clown told.

meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle fall over? It was tired of being the blague of the town!
meanings.sent4: Her blague about the talking dog was so funny, it had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent5: The blague about the clumsy waiter was so clever, it stayed in everyone's memory.

meanings.sent1: She loves to blague with her friends during lunch break.
